title: Siri shares words of wisdom when asked about Apple’s rumored March event
content:
Bloomberg‘s Mark Gurman has been teasing a March Apple event for a few weeks now. As people were expecting invites from the Cupertino company dropping today, it looks like we may have to wait a bit more, according to Siri.

more…

The post Siri shares words of wisdom when asked about Apple’s rumored March event appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: As people expect Apple to drop invites for the rumored March event, if you ask Siri about it, Siri will say you can't hurry news.
